title: Francisco Lopes
text: Francisco José de Almeida Lopes (Vila Cova de Alva, 29 August 1955) is a Portuguese <a href="electrician">electrician</a> and <a href="Portuguese%20Communist%20Party">communist</a> politician, currently serving as <a href="Assembly%20of%20the%20Republic%20%28Portugal%29">Member of the Assembly of the Republic</a>. He gained national-wide attention as a candidate in the <a href="2011%20Portuguese%20presidential%20election">Portuguese presidential election of 2011</a>.
